title: Spicy Tomato
directions: Berry-based shakes tend to be higher in carbs and lower in fat, which is why we prefer drinking them right before or after a meal that is high in fat and protein, like eggs or steak. You can, however, up the fat content in either of these shakes by adding half an avocado, a spoonful of coconut milk or oil, nut butter, or yogurt if you eat dairy.
ingredients: 1/3 cup frozen spinach or a small handful raw spinach
1 teaspoon hot sauce or black pepper, or to taste
